about_the_game:
An automaton is a machine that answers a specific question without human intervention once it is turned on, such as whether a + b = c.

In this demo, we will learn the concepts of the simplest automaton model, the Finite State Automaton, and use it to cope with some challenges from the MAIN game.
detailed_description:
An automaton is a machine that answers a specific question without human intervention once it is turned on, such as whether a + b = c.

In this demo, we will learn the concepts of the simplest automaton model, the Finite State Automaton, and use it to cope with some challenges from the MAIN game.
name: Finite State Automaton Challenges Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this demo, we will play with the simplest automaton model, Finite State Automaton.
